knimeNode.name: RDKit Interactive Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Interactive table view with capability of hiliting and showing additional header information.

fullDescription.intro: Displays data in a table view with the capability to show additional header information in the column header, e.g. Smiles structures, produced by RDKit nodes. If the number of rows is unknown, the view counts the number of rows when opened. Furthermore, rows can be selected and hilited.

views.view: Interactive Table with additional header information, if present.
